content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE NAME = 'nyc_taxi_4' AND TYPE = 'U')
CREATE TABLE dbo.nyc_taxi_4
(
	tipped int,
	"fare.amount" real,
	"payment.type" bigint,
	"passenger.count" int,
	"trip.distance" float,
	"trip.time.secs" bigint,
	"pickup.time.bin" nvarchar(30)
)
WITH
(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO

COPY INTO dbo.nyc_taxi_4
(tipped 1, "fare.amount" 2, "payment.type" 3, "passenger.count" 4, "trip.distance" 5, "trip.time.secs" 6, "pickup.time.bin" 7)
FROM 'https://yifsoadlsgen2westus2.dfs.core.windows.net/sparkjob/TestData/test_data.csv'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'CSV',
	ROWTERMINATOR='0x0A',
	FIELDQUOTE = '"',
	FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
	FIRSTROW = 2
)
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM nyc_taxi_4
GO
